short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically fills the credentials in the login page of the SRS and redirects you to the verification page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically fills the credentials in the login page of the SRS and redirects you to the verification page. You only need to enter your credentials once in the extension popup. You can disable the extension anytime you want.
